CodeList.Name: Treatment Failure Reason

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the reason the drug or therapy was unsuccessful in treating the condition.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The mechanisms, functions, activities, or processes exhibited by microorganisms, especially bacteria, to resist or to become tolerant to antibiotics.
An indication that a medication schedule was modified by temporarily terminating a prescribed regimen of medication. (NCI)
Failure of a patient to follow medical advice, take medication as directed, or adhere to a prescribed course of treatment.
A drug serum concentration below therapeutic levels.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Treatment Failure Reason Terminology
